Tools

Open source accessibility tools

Authoring Tools

  • A11yFirst for CKEditor - Accessibility First on GitHub
  • Sa11y Ryerson Digital Media Projects - Sa11y on GitHub
  • retextjs: retext-readability plugin
  • retextjs: retext-equality plugin

Assistive Technology

  • NVDA - NVDA on GitHub

Page Level Evaluation

  • A11ygator - A11ygator on GitHub
  • Accessibility Insights by Microsoft - Accessibility Insights GitHub Page
  • Accessibility Toolbar Plugin - ACC Toolbar on GitHub
  • axe by Deque - axe GitHub Page
  • ANDI by SSA.gov - ANDI on GitHub
  • bbc-a11y on GitHub
  • Google Lighthouse - Lighthouse on GitHub
  • IBM Equal Access Toolkit - equal-access on GitHub
  • Tota11y - Tota11y on GitHub
  • Web Accessibility Toolbar (WAT) by TPG - WAT on GitHub
  • Explore ARIA Landmarks Browser Extension - Landmarks on GitHub
  • Visual ARIA Bookmarklet - Visual ARIA on GitHub

Site-wide Evaluation

  • bbc-a11y on GitHub
  • Domain Accessibility Audit by MSU College of Natural Science on GitHub
  • Pa11y - Pa11y on GitHub
  • purple-hats by Government Digital Services, Singapore on GitHub

JavaScript Checkers

  • jest-axe - for testing ReactJS, Enzyme or Vue
  • Nightwatch aXe-core - Nightwatch aXe-core on GitHub

PDF Checkers

Note: There are no tools that easily fit this criteria. All of these are related though.

  • PAC 3 - Freeware but not open source
  • PAVE - Free service, claims to be open source but hasn’t released the soruce code
  • PDF Parser - not accessibility focused
  • PyPDF2 - not accessibility focused
  • pdfwam available as free PDF Check - out of date

Color

  • Accessible color combinations - Color combinations on GitHub
  • Accessible color palette builder - Accessible Color Palette on GitHub
  • ButtonBuddy - ButtonBuddy on GitHub
  • Color Contrast Analyser for Sketch on GitHub
  • Colour Contrast Analyser (CCA) by TPG - CCAe on GitHub
  • Color Oracle - Oracle-Mac on GitHub & Oracle-Windows on GitHub
  • Contrast Finder by Tanaguru - Contrast Finder GitHub Page
  • Contrast Grid - Contrast Grid on GitHub
  • Contrast-Ratio.com - Contrast-Ratio GitHub Page
  • Pika MacOS Color Picker - Pika on GitHub
  • Sim Daltonism - sim-daltonism on GitHub

Simulators

  • TBD

Other Lists of Tools

  • Donna Bungard’s An Incomplete List of Tools for Accessibility
  • Accessibility Lists of Lists
  • Web Accessibility Evaluation Tools List
